Articles.Content: I'm currently practicing my "I'm happy for you even though I didn't win" face so that I don't end up like this if I don't win an award. I'm Joey btw xD

I'm currently practicing my "I'm happy for you even though I didn't win" face so that I don't end up like this if I don't win an award. I'm Joey btw xD

http://cdn.makeagif.com/media/5-26-2015/Etb8hD.gif

I can't imagine what I would do if my channel didn't win.

Encountered @UpsilonAerospace on Das's stream.

Edited May 28, 2015 by FireFaced
Judgment Day is here.... prepare yourselves and good luck to you all!

Lol! ^

I am pleased to report due to Scott Manley and RoninPawn and many others, my awesome-o-meter has broke after spending hours pegged to the max.

Unfortunately I need a day or two more to go through all the channels. There's a lot of incredibly awesome talent out there and I don't want to rush it. I will end up wasting hours on a single channel when I see a particularly epic series of explosions. Or spacecraft made out of recycled materials. Or Scott Manley vs kids in a deathmatch over Kerbin City
Ok. That's fine. Just so long as the results come in by the 3rd of June. My exams start then and I won't be able to celebrate (if I win or lose. Failure party anyone? XD ) for 2 weeks

That should be sufficient time for me, so long as the server room doesn't blow up when I'm away, users/managers/fellow kerbal engineers don't stage a riot, etc.

There are a couple other judges also submitting their votes though.

Showcase and best video overall nomination:

not sure if we can self nominate. would be interested to see if its worthy to compete.

Showcase and best video overall nomination:

not sure if we can self nominate. would be interested to see if its worthy to compete.

Nominations are closed.

That should be sufficient time for me, so long as the server room doesn't blow up when I'm away, users/managers/fellow kerbal engineers don't stage a riot, etc.

There are a couple other judges also submitting their votes though.

Time for judging dayÃ¢â‚¬â€¹!
Hype! let the judging.. continue?
I think I'll make one more cinematic before my exams so that there's something new to look at on my channel
I just bought video editing software, and now I'm putting off using it. That's not good.

I just bought video editing software, and now I'm putting off using it. That's not good.

I'll be getting Sony Vegas pro 13 after my exams so I'm hyped for that! What editor did you get?
PowerDirector 13 Ultimate. I was on a budget, and I heard that PowerDirector was good, so I got it.
Yep, I like PowerDirector 13 too. Although if you just recently heard it was good in a KSP video then that was probably mine, so you already knew that!
How did you know, Bob? I guess great minds think alike.
Two days! Or one, depending on how you look at it.

So I just finished a really long game of monopoly. Are the results here yet?

Aw...
Would be cool if the trophies were actually 3D printed out and sent to the winners

Hey guys!

Semi-finalists are not up yet. - Please don't have a heart attack.

Unfortunately, pandoras kitten hasn't sent in the full set of scores... yet. Also, one judge (not naming names here) hasn't submitted his entries at all yet. I'll send him/her a PM now.

Most of the scores are all-but-settled, but I just want to make sure that everything is properly tallied before announcing the finalists. (There's a separate and honorable badge for the finalists, which you can take a look at here. It's quite nice.)

Even after the finalists are announced, I'm going to have another round of judging for the Grand Supreme Winners. It will likely be a week or so more before those results come out. Hopefully, we can get some hype going in the meantime!

I really appreciate all of the judges' hard work on this. It was quite an endeavor for me to judge the Oscar-B's, myself. I had a lot of trouble with deciding the second-place entry for one category, for example: there were no less than three entries that were fully deserving of that spot. Let it be known to all of the nominees that even if you aren't a finalist, your stuff is still great.

I would love to 3D-print trophies for all of the winners, but they start at about $100 and there are fourteen categories. I really don't want to spend some $1,400 on this. Hopefully that's understandable. (If you can think of an alternate way of doing it or if you own a fancy 3D printer, PM me! I'd love to make that happen.)

Sorry for the brief update. I know that some of you were expecting more than this. And trust me, it is coming soon.

-Upsilon

D: What is the estimated time of at least finalists? Also, I hope that the fact that I haven't posted a video in a while doesn't lose my vote.

Edited June 2, 2015 by FireFaced

When the few remaining judges submit their full disclosures of who is the King of All Awesome :3

I'd suggest not to rush them, as there are many categories and individual videos to go through - we certainly want to watch everything that is watchable and bask in the light of all that is awesome :3
"all that is awesome" That sounds cool.
I think I've knocked myself down a few votes because of how inpatient and pushy I've been for these results xD
